# Illusionary Mist

## Quick Facts
- Element/Type: Yin Release
- Classification: Genjutsu
- Class: Defensive, Supplementary
- Range: Short, Mid, Long
- Users: Isobu,
- Media: Anime

## Summary
The Three-Tails releases a mist created by its chakra to put intruders under an illusion. The illusion torments the target with events from their past.

## Notes
- The illusion will vanish if the victim can break the illusion, either by themselves or with the assistance of another.
